description:
Keroro has terrible cabin fever, and is desperate to find some way to leave the house without getting dissected or experimented upon.  Maybe he could pretend to be human?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Amphibian on the Verge of a Nervous Breakdown!
Crise de nerds / La mission top secrète
Keroro Kiken Rinkaiten Toppa de Arimasu / Keroro Gokuhi Ninmu Kaishi de Arimasu
